verses.verse: And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto Jacob <WH3290>, Arise <WH6965>, go up <WH5927> to Beth-el <WH1008>, and dwell <WH3427> there <WH6213>: and make there an altar <WH4196> unto God <WH410>, who appeared <WH7200> unto thee when thou fleddest <WH1272> from the face <WH6440> of Esau <WH6215> thy brother <WH251>.

Then Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto his household <WH1004>, and to all that were with him <WH5493>, Put away the foreign <WH5236> gods <WH430> that are among you <WH8432>, and purify <WH2891> yourselves <WH2498>, and change your garments <WH8071>:

and let us arise <WH6965>, and go up <WH5927> to Beth-el <WH1008>; and I will make <WH6213> there an altar <WH4196> unto God <WH410>, who answered <WH6030> me in the day <WH3117> of my distress <WH6869>, and was with me in the way <WH1870> which I went <WH1980>.

And they gave <WH5414> unto Jacob <WH3290> all the foreign <WH5236> gods <WH430> which were in their hand <WH3027>, and the rings <WH5141> which were in their ears <WH241>; and Jacob <WH3290> hid <WH2934> them under the oak <WH424> which was by Shechem <WH7927>.

And they journeyed <WH5265>: and a terror <WH2847> of God <WH430> was upon the cities <WH5892> that were round about <WH5439> them <WH7291>, and they did not pursue after <WH310> the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>.
So Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> to Luz <WH3870>, which is in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> (the same is Beth-el <WH1008>), he and all the people that were with him <WH5971>.

And he built <WH1129> there an altar <WH4196>, and called <WH7121> the place <WH4725> El-beth <WH416>-el; because there God <WH430> was revealed <WH1540> unto him <WH1272>, when he fled from the face <WH6440> of his brother <WH251>.

And Deborah <WH1683> Rebekah <WH7259>'s nurse <WH3243> died <WH4191>, and she was buried <WH6912> below Beth-el <WH1008> under the oak <WH437>: and the name <WH8034> of it was called <WH7121> Allon-bacuth <WH439>.
And God <WH430> appeared <WH7200> unto Jacob <WH3290> again <WH935>, when he came from Paddan-aram <WH6307>, and blessed him <WH1288>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him <WH8034>, Thy name is Jacob <WH3290>: thy name <WH8034> shall not be called <WH7121> any more Jacob <WH3290>, but Israel <WH3478> shall be thy name <WH8034>: and he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Israel <WH3478>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him <WH410>, I am God Almighty <WH7706>: be fruitful <WH6509> and multiply <WH7235>; a nation <WH1471> and a company <WH6951> of nations <WH1471> shall be of thee <WH4428>, and kings shall come <WH3318> out of thy loins <WH2504>;
and the land <WH776> which I gave <WH5414> unto Abraham <WH85> and Isaac <WH3327>, to thee I will give it <WH5414>, and to thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310> will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776>.
And God <WH430> went up <WH5927> from him in the place <WH4725> where he spake with him <WH1696>.

And Jacob <WH3290> set up <WH5324> a pillar <WH4676> in the place <WH4725> where he spake <WH1696> with him <WH4678>, a pillar of stone <WH68>: and he poured <WH5258> out a drink-offering <WH5262> thereon <WH3332>, and poured oil thereon <WH8081>.
And Jacob <WH3290> called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> where God <WH430> spake <WH1696> with him <WH1008>, Beth-el.

And they journeyed <WH5265> from Beth-el <WH1008>; and there was still <WH5750> some <WH3530> distance <WH776> to come <WH935> to Ephrath <WH672>: and Rachel <WH7354> travailed <WH3205>, and she had hard <WH7185> labor <WH3205>.
And it came to pass <WH7185>, when she was in hard labor <WH3205>, that the midwife <WH3205> said <WH559> unto her <WH3372>, Fear not <WH1121>; for now thou shalt have another son.

And it came to pass <WH5315>, as her soul was departing <WH3318> (for she died <WH4191>), that she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Ben-oni <WH1126>: but his father <WH1> called <WH7121> him Benjamin <WH1144>.
And Rachel <WH7354> died <WH4191>, and was buried <WH6912> in the way <WH1870> to Ephrath <WH672> (the same is Beth-lehem <WH1035>).
And Jacob <WH3290> set <WH5324> up a pillar <WH4678> upon her grave <WH6900>: the same is the Pillar <WH4678> of Rachel <WH7354>'s grave <WH6900> unto this day <WH3117>.
And Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265>, and spread <WH5186> his tent <WH168> beyond <WH1973> the tower <WH4026> of Eder <WH4029>.

And it came to pass <WH3478>, while Israel dwelt <WH7931> in that land <WH776>, that Reuben <WH7205> went <WH3212> and lay <WH7901> with Bilhah <WH1090> his father <WH1>'s concubine <WH6370>: and Israel <WH3478> heard <WH8085> of it <WH1121>. Now the sons of Jacob <WH3290> were twelve <WH8147>:
the sons <WH1121> of Leah <WH3812>: Reuben <WH7205>, Jacob <WH3290>'s first-born <WH1060>, and Simeon <WH8095>, and Levi <WH3878>, and Judah <WH3063>, and Issachar <WH3485>, and Zebulun <WH2074>;
the sons <WH1121> of Rachel <WH7354>: Joseph <WH3130> and Benjamin <WH1144>;
and the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>, Rachel <WH7354>'s handmaid <WH8198>: Dan <WH1835> and Naphtali <WH5321>;

and the sons <WH1121> of Zilpah <WH2153>, Leah <WH3812>'s handmaid <WH8198>: Gad <WH1410> and Asher <WH836>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290>, that were born <WH3205> to him in Paddan-aram <WH6307>.

And Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> unto Isaac <WH3327> his father <WH1> to Mamre <WH4471>, to Kiriath-arba <WH7153> (the same is Hebron <WH2275>), where Abraham <WH85> and Isaac <WH3327> sojourned <WH1481>.
And the days <WH3117> of Isaac <WH3327> were a hundred <WH3967> and fourscore <WH8084> years <WH8141>.

And Isaac <WH3327> gave up the ghost <WH1478>, and died <WH4191>, and was gathered <WH622> unto his people <WH5971>, old <WH2205> and full <WH7649> of days <WH3117>: and Esau <WH6215> and Jacob <WH3290> his sons <WH1121> buried him <WH6912>.
